synopsis.text:
Grankingdom, once ruled by General Logi, has been succeeded by Rosekstan, leading to a new wave of chaos threatening to engulf the world. In the midst of this turmoil, Shu, bereft of his shadow's power, the Blue Dragon, joins forces with Bouquet and the resistance movement spearheaded by Legalas. Their mission: to challenge the oppressive regime of Rosekstan.

Their lives take an unexpected turn when they serendipitously encounter Noi, an enigmatic young boy with the extraordinary ability to restore their shadow powers. In the process of rescuing Noi from the menacing clutches of a red dragon, Shu and his companions embark on a transformative journey to unravel the enigma surrounding the dragons and their purpose.

Throughout this perilous expedition, they must confront and surmount a series of trials, all the while striving to thwart the impending catastrophe that jeopardizes the very existence of mankind. Will Shu and his friends uncover the truth behind the dragons and safeguard humanity's future? Join them in this thrilling adventure to find out!
